COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152
STRING: I didn't go to the Old Wing to wait for Lise today,
passing the time in the cafeteria instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168
STRING: Yesterday, without much ado, Lise and I performed an
ensemble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174
STRING: I hadn't received a clear answer from her, so we barely
said anything to each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a
STRING: We simply performed together in silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196
STRING: But maybe that was good enough.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2
STRING: All the things we wanted to say were in the music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae
STRING: There are many times when feelings are conveyed
without words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba
STRING: Of course, words are needed in many other cases, but if
that time came, I believed the words would come from
Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0
STRING: I already had that level of trust in her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc
STRING: And I was sure that I wasn't the only one who felt it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8
STRING: Lise probably had the same thoughts about me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc
STRING: I stood up, not knowing how many times the bell had
rung.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x266
STRING: I was outside the Old Wing, alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272
STRING: No... I was not alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e
STRING: [Chris] “Erm, Ms. Cordell...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0
STRING: [Cordell] “Oh, it's Chris. What are you doing here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6
STRING: [Chris] “That's a good question. I'd like to ask that
myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e4
STRING: [Cordell] “Well, did you come here to practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fa
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I guess....”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318
STRING: [Cordell] “I heard that you haven't been seen in the
practice rooms recently, but who knew that you'd be
practicing here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338
STRING: [Chris] “And what about you, Ms. Cordell?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356
STRING: [Cordell] “From the look of it, I guess you haven't
looked at the bulletin board.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c
STRING: [Chris] “Erm... Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38a
STRING: [Cordell] “The Old Wing is off limits, starting today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3be
STRING: [Cordell] “There were reports of advanced deterioration,
and the building was assessed yesterday. This was the
result.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3de
STRING: [Chris] “B-But... The building is perfectly fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x410
STRING: [Cordell] “I agree, but that's what the higher-ups
decided. You'll have to go somewhere else. The
practice rooms should be fine, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x430
STRING: [Chris] “That's not the issue...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x462
STRING: [Cordell] “Anyway, you can't go inside any more. It's
locked.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x482
STRING: [Chris] “Wh-What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a0
STRING: [Cordell] “You have fond memories of the building, no
doubt, but all things age. And it's probably not safe
inside, no matter what our eyes tell us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c0
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f2
STRING: [Cordell] “I'm in charge of patrolling the building, but I
didn't expect any students to be here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52a
STRING: In any case,
you can't practice here. Find somewhere else.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x540
STRING: [Chris] “...Understood.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55e
STRING: [Cordell] “Hmm? Aren't you leaving?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x574
STRING: [Chris] “Actually, I'm waiting for someone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a6
STRING: [Cordell] “Oh. Someone you practiced with here,
perhaps?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5bc
STRING: [Chris] “...That would be the case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ee
STRING: [Cordell] “Hmm... Then you should use the back door
down that path.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60e
STRING: Ms. Cordell pointed at a small path that went round the
building.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x624
STRING: [Chris] “...What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x642
STRING: [Cordell] “Only the back door is still unlocked, in case
students have left anything inside. But I must say,
there've been many forgotten items today. In fact,
a first year
[Cordell] female student just went inside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66c
STRING: [Chris] “You mean...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69e
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris, you've forgotten something too, haven't
you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b4
STRING: [Chris] “Er... Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e6
STRING: [Cordell] “Well then, hurry along.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fc
STRING: Ms. Cordell smiled, as if to say that she knew
everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x726
STRING: On the other side of the building, where Ms. Cordell
said it would be, there was a back door, and it was
unlocked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73c
STRING: I went inside and headed to the music room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x762
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79c
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... Chris. You came.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b2
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I left something behind here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e4
STRING: [Lise] “Left something...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fa
STRING: [Chris] “Never mind... Just some phony line that popped
into my head.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x836
STRING: [Lise] “I... I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84c
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, we can't stay here for long. Though I
think we'll be fine while Ms. Cordell is on patrol duty.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x892
STRING: [Lise] “I'm sorry that things ended up like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b2
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? It's not your fault, Lise, so don't worry
about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ee
STRING: [Lise] “I guess we... I mean, our practice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x904
STRING: [Chris] “Would be nice if we could continue somewhere.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x936
STRING: [Lise] “...It's not that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x97e
STRING: [Lise] “We... Is it okay for us to continue doing this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99e
STRING: [Chris] “Why wouldn't it be? At least, I think it's okay...
But your opinion is important too, Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e4
STRING: [Lise] “No... I mean... I... I think it's okay too. But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fa
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa26
STRING: [Chris] “We can't use this place any more, but the
ensembles... We'll continue, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa70
STRING: Lise didn't reply for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: She kept opening her mouth and then frowning, as if
recalling something, whereupon she'd swallow the
words stuck in her throat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9c
STRING: For my part, because I had already told her how I felt, I
could only wait for her to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xace
STRING: [Lise] “...Am I really the one you want?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae4
STRING: She finally said it, and I answered right away, relieved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf0
STRING: [Chris] “Of course. I... I want to perform with you, Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2c
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb42
STRING: [Chris] “But the problem is where...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb74
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8a
STRING: [Chris] “The practice rooms at school...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbbc
STRING: [Lise] “I don't like them much...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd2
STRING: But then I couldn't think of anywhere else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: We needed a place where Fortelle playing or singing
would be okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbea
STRING: The school grounds were out of the question, I guess.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf6
STRING: ...Which means my room was the only option left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc02
STRING: I thought of Lise's house too, for a moment, but that'd
be impossible for a variety of reasons.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc18
STRING: [Chris] “What about my room? I... This is probably too
sudden... Inviting you to my room, but... I don't mean it
that way...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc74
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca6
STRING: [Lise] “Nothing. I... I don't mind going to your room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: [Chris] “R-Really? That's great...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: [Lise] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: [Chris] “Well... When's a good time? Today's the last
day this week that you can come here, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4a
STRING: [Lise] “Th-That's right. On Thursday and Friday... I have
things to attend to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6a
STRING: [Chris] “Well, how about Saturday?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd88
STRING: [Lise] “S-Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9e
STRING: For a moment I thought of Natale too, but stopped
myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdaa
STRING: In the back of my head was the fact that Arietta couldn't
come for Natale, but perhaps Saturday would be
enough.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc0
STRING: Lise and I weren't formally partners yet, and she had the
right to spend Natale with someone else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd6
STRING: ...But if Lise said she could meet on Natale, how should
I respond?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdec
STRING: Lise would never say such a thing, given her personality,
but what if she said she wanted to meet?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe02
STRING: I wouldn't be able to say no, I guess.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0e
STRING: No, honestly, I wouldn't say no, or rather I wouldn't
want to say no.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe24
STRING: I could make an excuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe30
STRING: In order to ask her to be my graduation recital partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3c
STRING: All for Lise's sake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: And I-

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe54
STRING: I realized that I felt I had to make an excuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7c
STRING: [Lise] “Umm... Is something the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe92
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... No. It's nothing. Just some random
thoughts.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec4
STRING: [Lise] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeda
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, let's forget about practicing here
today. Ms. Cordell's waiting outside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf02
STRING: [Lise] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf46
STRING: [Cordell] “You certainly took your time. Did you find it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5c
STRING: Ms. Cordell was waiting at the gate, and spoke as soon
as she saw us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf72
STRING: [Chris] “Yes I did, as you can see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9c
STRING: I took a half step to the side, so that she could see Lise
behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfce
STRING: [Cordell] “That's quite a cute item you left behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffc
STRING: Well,
this building will be off limits from now on. Even
the back door will be locked.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101c
STRING: [Chris] “No problem.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103a
STRING: [Cordell] “Liselsia. You understand as well, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106c
STRING: [Lise] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1082
STRING: Ms. Cordell called her by name to make sure she
understood.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108e
STRING: Did Ms. Cordell know about Lise?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109a
STRING: ...Now that I think about it, didn't Grave refer to me
and Asino as Cordell's students?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b0
STRING: There might have been some connection, or maybe
she'd just asked Lise her name when Lise went to
retrieve her items.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d0
STRING: Anyway, I couldn't confirm anything in front of Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10dc
STRING: [Chris] “We'll be off, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110e
STRING: [Cordell] “Alright. I'll walk around for a while longer until
another teacher takes over. I have lessons after this too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1130
STRING: Taking leave of Ms. Cordell, Lise and I returned to the
campus.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1182
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... Are you heading home now? Or would
you like to stop by my place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a2
STRING: [Chris] “We can meet on Saturday, but I thought it'd be
better for you to know where my room is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ca
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... In that case... If it's okay, let's go to your
place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ea
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121c
STRING: [Lise] “O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1236
STRING: And so we started walking toward the gate, when
someone called out from behind us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1262
STRING: [Torta] “Chris... And is that... Liselsia?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1278
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ac
STRING: I turned back and saw Torta standing there, looking
downcast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: I wonder if today's practice was over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e0
STRING: [Torta] “Are you two going to practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f6
STRING: [Chris] “No, we're heading home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1328
STRING: [Torta] “Really? It's almost time for the graduation
recital, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133e
STRING: [Chris] “...So it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1354
STRING: I hadn't even decided on the graduation recital yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1360
STRING: Although I'd told Lise that I wanted her to be my
partner, I hadn't received a formal answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: We'd only performed ensembles, enjoying our time
together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138c
STRING: ...That's why I had to be vague in my answer to Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b4
STRING: [Torta] “I see... There's just one more thing, is that
okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ca
STRING: [Chris] “What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fc
STRING: [Torta] “I'd like to speak with Liselsia, just the two of us.
Is now a good time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x141c
STRING: [Chris] “Uh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143a
STRING: [Torta] “As her senior in the vocal course, there are
things I'd like to say to her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, speaking about that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1466
STRING: Torta didn't know that Lise was a Fortelle student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147c
STRING: I didn't know how to explain that to her, but then Lise
responded first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ae
STRING: [Lise] “Um... I'm okay with that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c4
STRING: She walked over to Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d0
STRING: [Chris] “Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: [Lise] “I have things to say too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1518
STRING: Lise spoke curtly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1524
STRING: She rarely spoke like that, but... Perhaps it was a good
sign.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153a
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. But you'll get wet and maybe catch a
cold out here, so let's go indoors.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: [Torta] “...Sure. Are you okay with that, Liselsia?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15aa
STRING: The three of us headed to the Second Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e2
STRING: I stood where I could see the whole campus and looked
outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f8
STRING: Torta and Lise went further inside, and spoke so softly
that I couldn't hear them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160e
STRING: While doing my best not to look at them, this time I
gazed out of the window.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1634
STRING: It was rare for Lise to initiate conversation with others.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164a
STRING: As for Torta, she didn't know about Lise, so her behavior
was normal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1656
STRING: Perhaps that was precisely why Lise felt like speaking
up in that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166c
STRING: What would Torta think about Lise being a Fortelle
student?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1682
STRING: Would she get angry and say that it showed we weren't
thinking seriously?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168e
STRING: But I didn't think that would happen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169a
STRING: I felt Torta would probably give a resigned smile, and
encourage Lise to do her best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b0
STRING: There'd be only one way for me to respond to that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16bc
STRING: “Got it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1708
STRING: Amid all this thinking, I felt that some time had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x171e
STRING: Looking at the two, I found that they were still talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1734
STRING: I didn't think they had that much to say, but the clock
showed that it was already evening.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174c
STRING: What on earth could they be talking about?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x175a
STRING: Perhaps it was about how only voice students could
become partners.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1770
STRING: No... Torta would've said that to me first, and by the
look on their faces, that wasn't it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1790
STRING: They didn't seem angry or upset.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179c
STRING: They just seemed to be having a serious discussion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a8
STRING: If I were feeling complacent, I'd say that there was
nothing left for me to worry about, and that Torta was
just giving advice as a voice student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ca
STRING: I shook off those ridiculous thoughts, and looked up at
the sky again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e2
STRING: This time, I did not become lost in thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f8
STRING: I simply felt the passing of time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: After five minutes or so of that, I suddenly heard a voice
beside me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1870
STRING: [Torta] “Sorry for making you wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a4
STRING: They'd finished their talk and were standing near me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b8
STRING: [Lise] “Um... Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d6
STRING: [Torta] “It was important. Hope you understand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ec
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1918
STRING: Torta went outside, showing no inclination at all of
mentioning her talk with Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1942
STRING: I looked at Lise, who looked at Torta with a troubled
expression and followed her without saying a word.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1958
STRING: I had no choice but to follow Torta as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19b2
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I'm heading back to the practice rooms.
Go home quick, or you'll catch a cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d2
STRING: [Chris] “...Got it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e8
STRING: Torta looked up at the sky, then cupped her hands as if
to collect the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fe
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Do you find the rain that unusual?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a30
STRING: [Torta] “Not at all. I'm used to it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a46
STRING: Without letting on what she wanted to do, Torta simply
said that and turned around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a5c
STRING: Torta's next words were directed at Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a70
STRING: [Torta] “Keep it up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa2
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac6
STRING: And then, without looking at me, Torta headed back to
the Second Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1adc
STRING: Although that exchange didn't go quite as expected,
there was no point standing there in confusion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af2
STRING: I decided to talk to Lise as we walked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b32
STRING: I looked for the words to say to Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b3e
STRING: I wanted to ask about what she had said to Torta, but I
didn't know how to put it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b54
STRING: I was actually waiting for Lise to broach the subject, but
she kept looking at the ground, lost in thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6a
STRING: And I wondered if I'd always made Arie or Torta feel the
same way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb0
STRING: After telling Lise that we had reached my apartment,
she finally opened up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bea
STRING: [Lise] “Um... That's all for today, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c00
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c1e
STRING: [Lise] “I'll come here on Saturday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c34
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c66
STRING: [Lise] “I'm sorry. I'd like to think about things for a while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c7c
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, no problem.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cae
STRING: [Lise] “What time should I be here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc4
STRING: [Chris] “Any time is fine. I'll be here the whole day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cf6
STRING: [Lise] “...Understood. Then I'll see you Saturday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0c
STRING: [Chris] “See you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d26
STRING: Lise didn't say anything about her and Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d32
STRING: So I wasn't able to ask, and had no choice but to see
her off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d48
STRING: But, there was definitely something in Torta's attitude
that showed approval of Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d5e
STRING: I returned to my room, hoping that they had been
talking about songs, or something else that I wouldn't
know about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dbe
STRING: I dried my hair with a towel and looked around the
room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dca
STRING: Lise and I had made a promise, that we'd perform
ensembles in this room from now on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de0
STRING: So far, I'd only done that in this room with Arie and
Torta, who were really close to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df6
STRING: Both of them knew me well, and I'd felt unconstrained,
which is why I'd never thought much of this before...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0c
STRING: But my room lacked atmosphere, and I regretted my
decision a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e22
STRING: Lise did have her dislike of the school's practice rooms,
however.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e52
STRING: [Phorni] “Looking for something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e68
STRING: Phorni was probably wondering why I was looking
around the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e74
STRING: [Chris] “No, just thinking how bare this place is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea6
STRING: [Phorni] “You only just noticed?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ebc
STRING: I'd lived in this room for three years, but I wasn't
attached to it, and had never thought of decorating it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed2
STRING: I realized that Phorni had made up for that by
brightening the room with her presence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee8
STRING: [Chris] “You seem lively today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f1a
STRING: [Phorni] “And what do you mean by that? Good things, I
hope?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f3a
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm, I wonder...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f64
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f7a
STRING: Phorni glared at me, seemingly disaffected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f86
STRING: I couldn't possibly tell her now, but I'd have to do so at
some point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9c
STRING: That soon I'd perform ensembles in this room with a girl
who excelled at singing.
